title: Arabic 60
text: Put thy hand into My bosom, that I may rise above thee, radiant and resplendent.
teaser: Put thy hand into My bosom...

prev.title: Arabic 59
prev.text: Thy heart is My home; sanctify it for My descent. Thy spirit is My place of revelation; cleanse it for My manifestation.

next.title: Arabic 61
next.text: Ascend unto My heaven, that thou mayest obtain the joy of reunion, and from the chalice of imperishable glory quaff the peerless wine.
